maltestestpackage

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • maltestestpackage.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    inventory to hold items inventory length is determined by difficulty. starting items are a branch, some tattered clothes and a pot lid.
